name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner, v. Allen G. WASHINGTON, Respondent

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner, v. Allen G. WASHINGTON, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 28th day of January, 1988, the petition for allowance of appeal is granted. The order of Superior Court is vacated, see Commonwealth v. Samuels, 516 Pa. 300, 532 A.2d 404 (1987), and the case remanded to Superior Court for consideration of any issues not resolved in Respondent Washington’s appeal.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
536 A.2d 796
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner, v. Allen G. WASHINGTON, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 28, 1988.
